description: This Python script sets up an agent for multi-modal retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) using Llama 4 and OpenAI tools. It loads a PDF knowledge base, configures an agent with specific instructions, and demonstrates generating a recipe with an accompanying image.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with tools, knowledge base, and instructions for task execution.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a prompt.

methods.name: run_response
methods.description: Executes the agent's response generation process.
